mapper.insert: insert into tbl_shop(masterno, shopname, shopcategorycode, addr, addr2, wdo, kdo, shoptel, shopimage, shoptime, minprice, paymethod, sanghoname, wonsanji) values (seq_tbl_shop_masterno.nextval, #{shopname}, #{shopcategorycode}, #{addr}, #{addr2}, #{wdo}, #{kdo}, #{shoptel}, #{shopimage}, #{shoptime}, #{minprice}, #{paymethod}, #{sanghoname}, #{wonsanji})
